name: text_to_image
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool text2image.
Tool description: Generate images using SOTA text 2 image model.
API description: Generate an image based on the input text using the specified style through the Toolbench RapidAPI.

text.description: The text to convert into an image.
text.default: Daring treasure hunter, map and compass, standing in desolate desert, adventurous, detailed, high detail, portrait

style.description:
preset style, should be in this list:
'3d-model',
        'analog-film',
        'anime',
        'cinematic',
        'comic-book',
        'digital-art',
        'enhance',
        'fantasy-art',
        'isometric',
        'line-art',
        'low-poly',
        'modeling-compound',
        'neon-punk',
        'origami',
        'photographic',
        'pixel-art',
        'tile-texture',
